page.title: 12THE RAFT RACE
page.content: During July every year a raft-race takes place on Walney Island,from the Ferry Hotel to Piel Island.The distance covered is about 7.5 kms.The race is organised for charity,at present the majority of the money is going to the "Gamma Scanner Appeal." The event is organised by the Crown Hotel. All the rafts are hand-built out of any materials people can find,the only rule being that the rafts are sea-worthy!Some people that take part in the race do so in fancy-dress. When the race has finished the rafts are burned at a big party on Piel Island.
